backend/main.mo: Empty actor definition with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing hail‑effect, performance, and layout integration requirements with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Textual summaries of all frontend components and utilities, including hail and snowfall background descriptions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes with winter‑themed color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML root document loading the main React entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app layout composing header, hero, gallery, footer, and the hail background layer.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with attribution, animated heart icon, and a snowflake‑themed quote.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Image gallery showing six snowflakes with hover effects and modal dialogs for full‑size viewing.
frontend/src/components/HailBackground.t: Canvas animation generating fast drifting hailstones with motion‑blur streaks, DPR scaling, resize handling, and reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Centered title bar with animated snowflake icons and winter‑styled theming.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section presenting poetic text about snowflakes with decorative gradient divider.
frontend/src/components/SnowfallBackgrou: Empty placeholder file for the old snowfall background.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and caching backend actors based on Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for ICP Internet Identity authentication, wrapping AuthClient setup, login/clear actions, and status state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module exporting nothing because the app has no backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive OKLCH theme variables for light and dark winter-themed styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, providing React Query and Internet Identity context before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, winter theme extensions, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s feature set, versions, and winter-themed ICP React build template configuration.
